trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing"></xref> event.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件發生之前關閉表單，可能是由使用者透過使用者介面 (UI)，或是以程式設計的方式，透過呼叫方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: When you create a FormClosingEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 FormClosingEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
